meanings.definition: Carved or shaped with a chisel.
meanings.sent1: The chiselled statue looked very detailed.
meanings.sent2: His chiselled jawline caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The chiselled pumpkin face won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent4: Her chiselled words left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chiselled mountain peaks stood majestically against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The chiselled edges of the building gave it a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The actor's chiselled features made him perfect for the role.
meanings.sent3: The chiselled shadows on the wall looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her chiselled wit always kept her friends entertained.
meanings.sent5: The chiselled outline of the map made it easy to read.

meanings.definition: To shape or cut with a chisel.
meanings.sent1: He chiselled a beautiful design into the wood.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor carefully chiselled away at the marble.
meanings.sent3: She chiselled her initials into the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The artist chiselled out a masterpiece from the stone.
meanings.sent5: They chiselled intricate patterns onto the metal surface.
